scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "node-sass --include-path scss public/scss/app.scss public/css/custom.css --watch" "postcss public/css/tailwind.css -o public/build/tailwind.css --watch"  "live-server ./public"
scripts.serve:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "node-sass --include-path scss public/scss/app.scss public/css/custom.css --watch" "postcss public/css/tailwind.css -o public/build/tailwind.css --watch"  "live-server ./public"
scripts.build: concurrently "node-sass --include-path scss public/scss/app.scss public/css/custom.css" "postcss public/css/tailwind.css -o public/build/tailwind.css"
